Title: Requires notaries public and commissioners of deeds to complete and retain certain documents relating to the transfer of residential real property
Summary: Requires notaries public and commissioners of deeds to complete and retain certain documents relating to the transfer of residential real property; relates to forgery and offering a false document concerning residential real property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the requirements for notaries public and commissioners of deeds relating to certain instruments affecting real property; and to amend the penal law, in relation to forgery and the offering of false documents concerning residential real property
